title: Behind the Scenes at the JavaScript Registry
author: David Cassel
description: The JavaScript Registry wants to build a better package repository for JavaScript (and for TypeScript) by supporting features like type declaration files.
cntitle: JavaScript 注册中心的幕后故事
cndescription: JavaScript 注册表希望通过支持类型声明文件等功能，为 JavaScript（以及 TypeScript）构建一个更好的包存储库。
